attributes.action: make it mandatory to put recycle bins in fast food outlets and garage fourcourts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that the galactic giants are not putting forward the recycle message and the amounts of waste in garage fourcourts and fast food outlets could and should be recycled...coupious  amount of cans and bottles are put in with everyday waste...we need the goverment to pressure the industry to conform for us and our children and the future of this planet
